participant_1.background:
Lady gaga is my current favorite singer.
Madonna is my all time favorite.
I work in retail.
I love music.

participant_2.background:
I am a meat eater.
I like football on tv.
I love country music.
I drive a big truck.
I like to go hunting.

content.text: What kind of music do you listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my current favorite singer is Lady Gaga.
I've heard of her. I'm not really into pop music, but I've heard she's good.
Yeah, she's great. I also love Madonna. She's my all-time favorite.
I've never really listened to Madonna. What kind of music does she sing?
She sings a lot of different genres, but she's best known for her pop music. She's also known for her live performances, which are always amazing.
I'll have to check her out sometime. I'm not really into pop music, but I've heard good things about her.
Yeah, you should. She's really talented.
So, what do you do for a living?
I work in retail. I'm a sales associate at a clothing store.
Oh, that's cool. I used to work in retail when I was younger.
Yeah, it's not bad. It can be a lot of work, but it's also fun.
Yeah, I know what you mean. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to concerts, listen to music, and hang out with my friends.
Nice. I like to do a lot of the same things. I also like to go hunting and fishing.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been hunting or fishing, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
